Intruction: The first line is toolbar! Click the home icon, which can return to main menu. The dollar icon can go to the new page which will show the rate that 1 dollar transfer to other currency. The email icon can edit a message which can sent to other user. The twitter icon can connect http to twitter\'s home page. Choose the currency in spinner, enter amount in editText and choose second currency, and then click button "convert", which will calulate the result from api. If you want to save the result, click the "save to history" button, which will store to database and when the user open it secondly, it will show again!
